resources.string: Allows the application to implement reminders for upcoming buses.
Sorry, there was a communication error and we can\'t show this information. Try again and it might work.
Failed to update. We\'ll try again in a minute.
Sorry, that particular route can\'t be found. If this was a shortcut, it\'s possible your link is out of date, or a region hasn\'t been selected yet (Change in \"Preferences->Your region\").

Sorry, that particular route can\'t be found. If this was a shortcut, it\'s possible your link is out of date, or the wrong region is selected (Your current region is %1$s. Change in \"Preferences->Your region\").
Sorry, that particular stop can\'t be found. If this was a shortcut, it\'s possible your link is out of date, or a region hasn\'t been selected yet (Change in \"Preferences->Your region\").

Sorry, that particular stop can\'t be found. If this was a shortcut, it\'s possible your link is out of date, or the wrong region is selected (Your current region is %1$s. Change in \"Preferences->Your region\").
Oops, something went wrong. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
Sorry, there isn\'t enough available memory to handle that request.
OneBusAway\'s servers are overloaded. Please excuse us!
You appear to be offline or are not connected to the network.
You are not connected to the network.\nTurn off Airplane Mode?
Invalid URL. Please enter a working OneBusAway server.
Invalid URL. Please enter a working OpenTripPlanner server.

•  Removing social discussions - Social features will be disabled and removed on October 26th. Thank you to all who participated in this experimental feature.
•  Save default reminder time - When creating reminders, your previous time will be remembered (thanks tjasz!).
•  New Tampa fare payment app - See "Pay my fare" to try out the new Flamingo Fares app.
•  Improved launcher icon - Support for adaptive icons on supported devices.
•  Bug fixes - See https://bit.ly/oba-android-releases
Gray means \"Scheduled arrival\" - We don\'t know where the bus is now, but the schedule says there is an upcoming arrival
Gray with strikethrough means the trip has been canceled - this bus is NOT coming
OneBusAway would like your location, do you want to enable it now?
Trying to get a fix on your location…
Unable to get your location. Please give app location permissions via system settings.
You\'re looking at a place outside the %1$s service area.\n\nMove map to %1$s now?
No arrivals in the next %1$d min.

plurals.name: stop_info_nodata_hours_minutes
plurals.item: No arrivals in the next 1 hour and %1$d min.
No arrivals in the next %2$d hours and %1$d min.

resources.string: No additional arrivals in the next %1$d min.

plurals.name: stop_info_no_additional_data_hours_minutes
plurals.item: No additional arrivals in the next 1 hr and %1$d min.
No additional arrivals in the next %2$d hrs and %1$d min.

resources.string: Sliding panel expanded. Tap or press Back button to collapse.
Sliding panel collapsed. Tap to expand and show detailed arrivals list, or press Back button to hide.
Would you like to be notified when you are approaching this stop?
Destination reminders rely on GPS, which is not always reliable and will not work indoors, underground, or in areas without a clear view of the sky. Always be aware of your surroundings.
Were you notified at the right time?
Were you notified at the right time to exit at your stop?
Include system log (your choice will be saved for future trips)

Your feedback will be sent to OneBusAway. If you check \"Include system logs\" , real-time location information from your device recorded as you approached your destination stop will be shared with OneBusAway so developers can improve the destination reminder feature.\n\nChange your preference for sharing system logs in Settings.
Anonymous real-time location information from your device will be shared with OneBusAway to improve the destination reminder feature.

Your current device "Location method" setting may fail to notify you when approaching your destination due to inaccurate position information. Would you like to change your device "Location method" to "High accuracy" now?
Sorry, map information isn\'t available for this route
You have no starred stops.\n\nYou can add a star to a stop on the arrivals screen by tapping on the star next to the stop name.
There\'s no going back! Go ahead?
Service alert warning - tap to slide up panel and reveal more info.
Severe service alert - tap to slide up panel and reveal more info.
Find a stop by entering its stop number in the search box.\n\nThe stop number is 3 to 5 digits and can be found on the stop signpost or shelter.
Find a route by entering its route name or number in the search box.
There are no results that match your search.
Historical occupancy (gray icon) is an average of trip ridership at this stop over the last 6 months.

Real-time occupancy is shown using green coloring when there are many seats available or standing room available, and is shown in red coloring when the vehicle is full. Historical occupancy (gray icon) is an average of trip ridership at this stop over the last 6 months.
You don\'t have any reminders.\n\nYou can create reminders by tapping on an arriving bus at your stop.
Triggering a notification for your reminder…
Your reports help OneBusAway find and fix problems!
Unable to send the report. Try again?
Disabled automatic region selection. You can enable in Preferences.
OneBusAway Android: Trip Plan Failed Feedback

Your device doesn\'t have the Play Store installed. Please find another way to install Google Maps.
Dig deeper into the nuts and bolts
A custom API server is being used
Set your current transit region based on your current location
Include buses that just left as negative arrival times
When viewing starred stops, show arrival info in the header at the top of the screen (doesn\'t affect map view)
After planning a trip, send notifications if the trip is delayed or no longer recommended.
Display informational popups explaining how to use features
Flips placement of some buttons to the left side of the screen
Determines the server used in OpenTripPlanner API calls
Determines the server used in OneBusAway API calls
Saves your starred and recent stops and routes
This will wipe out any existing data! Go ahead?
Enables regions that may be unstable
Experimental regions may be unstable and without real-time info! Go ahead?
Your current experimental region won\'t be available! Go ahead?
Show instructions for using this app
Find out more about the open-source project
Your region is currently set to %1$s. If we got this wrong, please tap on \'Your Region\' to change it!
Please tap on stop on map
Address not found. Please check your address.
Service description could not be found.
Image couldn\'t be resized - using full size.
No arrival times, please check back later.
An error occurred during submission, please try again later.
Driver compliments and complaints, lost & found, etc.
Missing route, wrong stop name, etc.
Vehicle never came, wrong arrival time, etc.
Submit and vote on future improvements
Never miss the bus at night again!
Tired of watching your bus fly by because the driver couldn\'t see you in the dark? Hold up your flashing Night Light and make yourself visible!
Tap on a stop (green dot on the map) to see arrival times.
Would you like to see popup descriptions for how to use OneBusAway? You can always turn the popups on or off in Settings, or show the tutorial later via Help.
How long until your bus arrives?

This long! Colored background tells you if the bus is early (red) or late (blue). On time = green background. If we don\'t know where the bus is, the scheduled time is shown (gray background). Gray with strikethrough text (a line through it) means the trip is canceled.
Slide up to show more arrivals
Tap on the arrow or drag the panel up to see more arrivals for this stop.
Arrivals can be sorted by estimated arrival time, or sorted/grouped by route using the \"Sort\" button at the top of the screen.
Tap on the star to pin your favorite routes to the top of the sliding panel.
Find the stops and routes that you\'ve recently looked at via the \"More\" button at the top right of the screen.
Organize your favorite stops by name or frequency of use with the \"Sort\" button at the top of the screen.
Long-press on a stop to create a shortcut on your home screen. Tap on the shortcut to instantly see arrivals!
You can report a variety of issue types to your local government near this stop. Tap on the drop-down box to see a full list.
Enter the address or location name
You can use addresses or location names for origins and destinations when planning a trip. Stop IDs and cross streets are not currently supported in trip plans.

To show your real-time position on the map you\'ll need to grant location permissions. If you select \"Never ask again\" you will need to reinstall the app or enable permissions via system settings to see your real-time location.
Access to device storage is required
To backup or restore your data, OneBusAway needs permission to access your local device storage.

"Find out more about the OneBusAway open-source project at https://onebusaway.org.

"

Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
Please check your Internet connection and try again.
Please check your Internet connection and try again.
Origin or destination is outside transportation network coverage
Couldn\'t find a matching route between origin and destination
Transit times for selected date are not available
Something went wrong. Change your trip options and try again.
Something went wrong. Change your bike options and try again
There is no trip planning contact for this region.

Google is now charging OneBusAway for all trip plans (about $1,000 per month)! OBA is an open source project and can\’t pay for these costs. We\'ve created a non-profit and applied to Google for Nonprofits, but are still waiting for approval. In the mean-time, we\'ve had to shut down the trip planner. If you\'d like to express your support for OneBusAway to Google for Nonprofits, please reach out to them on Twitter at https://twitter.com/googlenonprofit?s=17!
We found a better trip plan
Tap to see new results for your last origin/destination.

Battery optimizations are enabled for this application which may decrease the performance of the application. To get the best experience from this application, please go to settings and disable performance optimizations for OneBusAway.
We\'d like your help with research to improve transit service.
Are you over the age of 18?
Thanks for your interest, but you need to be over the age of 18 to participate.
Please provide your email address for the online surveys
You successfully enrolled in the study.
Failed to enroll in the study. Please try again later.
